rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do Any co-req unit set {MAE-TRANS, MAE-WATER, MAEINFRA01, MAETRAN01, MAEWATR01} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE IN {4688, E6001} Do true Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CIV3264}

description: This unit considers the quality and quantity aspects of water resources management. Tools and techniques appropriate for design and analysis of water resource systems are introduced, starting from a development of quantitative hydrologic modelling and extending to quantitative prediction of water quality transformations. The fundamental principles of water quantity and quality modelling are also applied within a framework that allows the assessment of water quality in various watercourses.
